Corvas.name: Corvas
Corvas.notes: Bad range, fire rate, magazine size. Decent crit and damage.

Cyngas.name: Cyngas
Cyngas.notes: Great status chance, reload time, accuracy, and damage. Low ammo capacity. Burst fires.

Dual Decurion.name: Dual Decurion
Dual Decurion.notes: Falls off by level 40. Inaccurate, awful recoil, low magazine size and damage. Fast reload time and hitscan.

Fluctus.name: Fluctus
Fluctus.notes: Great accuracy, fire rate, reload time, mag size. Shoots waves.

Grattler.name: Grattler
Grattler.notes: High damage, fire rate and reload time. Magazine is small for fire rate. Self damages. Innate punchthrough.

Phaedra.name: Phaedra
Phaedra.notes: Hitscan, good status chance. Low accuracy, and reload time. Worse damage than other weapons, spins up.

Vandal Imperator.name: Vandal Imperator
Vandal Imperator.notes: Hitscan, Gigantic Magazine, Reload Time is more than Fire rate. Low damage per bullet. Spools-up

Velocitus.name: Velocitus
Velocitus.notes: Great damage, ammo, accuracy, and travel time. Mod changes if it should be charged or spammed.

Agkuza.name: Agkuza
Agkuza.notes: Really poor crit stats, but very high base damage, speed and stance to make it worthy

Centaur.name: Centaur
Centaur.notes: Great stats in attack speed, base damage, critical stats and has a good innate stance

Kaszas.name: Kaszas
Kaszas.notes: Poor critical stats, high base damage, good speed and stance

Knux.name: Knux
Knux.notes: A status monster. Base damage is high, speed is good, stance is clunky

Onorix.name: Onorix
Onorix.notes: A critical weapon with a sad 1.3x multiplier. Second worst archmelee by far. Still an upgrade to the Veritux

Prisma Veritux.name: Prisma Veritux
Prisma Veritux.notes: A Centaur with much less crit and slightly higher base damage. Still good, stance is smooth

Rathbone.name: Rathbone
Rathbone.notes: Stance is amazing, poor stats otherwise. High damage with melee combo

Amesha.name: Amesha
Amesha.notes: Watchful Swarm blocks a number of attacks on target ally. Benevolent Decoy creates a sphere that attracts all projectiles, healing friendlies for a percent of total damage abosrbed, per second. Warding Grace is an aura that slows enemies and prevents status effect on allies in range. Vengeful Rush converts all damage taken to energy, while boosting ability range, duration, and strength by 10% for allies in range, until energy is full.
Amesha.use: Charge Based Shield; Healing & Projectile Block; Status-Immunity & Slow; Ability Buff Aura

Elytron.name: Elytron
Elytron.notes: Bloomer sends a missile out to seek enemies, recast to detonate. Core Vent leaves smoke behind the Elytron, destroying projectiles that touch it. Can be augmented to do DOT. Thumper fires a beacon in a straight line; if recast or on collision, it pulses explosions for 30-45 sec. Warhead launches an aimable missle which deals massive damage and knockback.
Elytron.use: Nuke; Projectile Block; AOE DOT; AOE Nuke + Knockback

Itzal.name: Itzal
Itzal.notes: Blink teleports the Itzal forward a long distance, or until blocked, stunning all enemies in an area upon arrival. Penumbra is an aura that Cloaks allies in an area unless they move. Cosmic Crush pulls enemies in range to the Itzal then deals a burst of damage (if augmented it Freezes targets hit). Fighter Escort summons drones that zap enemies and explode after 15-30 sec or on death.
Itzal.use: AOE Stun, Teleportation, AOE Cloaking, Vacuum, Drones

Odonata Prime.name: Odonata Prime
Odonata Prime.notes: Energy Shell creates a mobile shield in front of Odonata (if augmented, nearby allies) that blocks all ranged attacks, applies 50% of weapon base damage as Heat and increases crit damage by 200%. Disarray fires flares that stagger enemies and destroy projectiles; Seeking Fire launches rockets at enemies, dealing damage. Repel knocks back, stuns for a duration, and disarms forever, any enemy in it's range when cast
Odonata Prime.use: Crit+Damage Boost & Shield; Projectile Block; AOE Blast; AOE Stun & Disarm

Adarza Kavat.name: Adarza Kavat
Adarza Kavat.notes: Cat's Eye grants 60% Flat Critical Chance to all Friendly Targets for 10 sec every 20 sec. Reflect gives a 40% Chance to reflect damage taken, dealing 160% of it back to the target.

Carrier Prime.name: Carrier Prime
Carrier Prime.notes: Ammo Case grants a 25% increase to your ammo pool and converts any unused ammo drops into usable ammo for your equipped weapon every 2 sec. Looter will break nearby containers. Goes down a tier if using non-bullet hose.

Chesa Kubrow.name: Chesa Kubrow
Chesa Kubrow.notes: Neutralize disarm an enemy within 20 m every few sec. Retrieve causes the Chesa to seek out dropped Mods, Energy Orbs, Health Orbs, Scannable Plants, Ayatan Sculptures, Ammo and Resource drops within 18 m. This occurs every few sec

Dethcube.name: Dethcube
Dethcube.notes: Vaporize will blast a target within 4 m for minor damage, stunning them for a short duration, This effect has a 30 sec cooldown

Diriga.abilities: Single Stunlock or AOE Damage Pulse
Diriga.name: Diriga
Diriga.notes: Electro Pulse stuns a target within 10 m until they are 15 m away or die. Has a 5 sec cooldown. Arc Coil will zap to 7 enemies in range every sec, dealing minor damage with a 10% chance to stun. Equiping both will negate Electro Pulse.

Djinn.name: Djinn
Djinn.notes: Fatal Attraction causes all enemies within 24 m to walk harmlessly towards the Djinn over 5 sec. If there are 2 or more enemies within 6 m at the end, it will deal an explosion of Corrosive damage with a 100% proc chance to everything within the 6m. This ability has a 30 sec cooldown

Helios Prime.name: Helios Prime
Helios Prime.notes: Investigator will perform codex scans 50 m (needs scanner charges equipped). Detect Vulnerability reveals weakspots for 10 sec on enemies in the codex, increasing damage taken by that enemy by 275%. Both abilities take 2 sec to activate. If not using Deconstructor Prime, goes to Viable tier

Helminth Charger.name: Helminth Charger
Helminth Charger.notes: Proboscis will pull a single target within 30 m to the Helminth, dealing minor damage. Trample causes the Helminth to ram towards an enemy, dealing heavy damage to everything in the way. Trample has an 8 sec cooldown

Huras Kubrow.name: Huras Kubrow
Huras Kubrow.notes: Stalk will cloak Huras and its Tenno for as long as an enemy is in line of sight. Cloak breaks on attack. After being broken the ability has an 8 sec cooldown. Hunt causes the Huras to ram towards an enemy, dealing heavy damage to everything in the way. Hunt has an 8 sec cooldown.

Prisma Shade.name: Prisma Shade
Prisma Shade.notes: Ghost will cloak the Shade and its Tenno for as long as an enemy is in line of sight. Cloak breaks on attack. After leaving cloak, this ability has a 10 sec cooldown.

Raksa Kubrow.name: Raksa Kubrow
Raksa Kubrow.notes: Howl fears up to 15 enemies within 24 m for 16 sec. This ability has a 40 sec cooldown. Protect restores up to 300 shields to the Raksa and its Tenno. This ability has a 7 sec cooldown

Sahasa Kubrow.name: Sahasa Kubrow
Sahasa Kubrow.notes: Dig causes the Sahasa to dig for 5 sec and create a pile of items. This ability has a 15 sec cooldown (longer if near a previous dig site). Ferocity allows the Sahasa to deal bonus damage to downed enemies, if non-fatal the kubrow is stunned for a few sec. Less loot frames equates to higher tier.

Smeeta Kavat.name: Smeeta Kavat
Smeeta Kavat.notes: Mischief creates a clone of Smeeta and cloaks the kavat. Clone lives for 9 sec with a 7 sec cooldown. Charm has a 28% chance to grant a random buff, every 27 sec. Possible buffs: 200% Flat Critical chance for 30 seconds, 100% Energy Costs Refunded for 10 seconds, Double Affinity and Resource pickups for 120 seconds, Reload Instantly, Ignore the damage of next recieved hit and gives 150 shields, or 1 rare resource from the planet you are on

Sunika Kubrow.name: Sunika Kubrow
Sunika Kubrow.notes: Unleashed causes the Sunika to charge 60 m and pin down any VIP (includes Capture Targets, Synthisis Targets, and some Bosses). Savagery allows the Sahasa to deal bonus damage to downed enemies; If non-fatal the kubrow will be stunned for a few seconds

Taxon.name: Taxon
Taxon.notes: Molecular Conversion will blast an enemy within 10 m for 200 radiation damage, generating shields equal to damage dealt. This ability has a 12 sec cooldown

Wyrm Prime.name: Wyrm Prime
Wyrm Prime.notes: Crowd Dispersion deals 10 magnetic damage and ragdolls everything within 10 m. This ability has a 15 sec cooldown; Only triggers if there's more than one enemy within range

Banshee Prime.name: Banshee Prime
Banshee Prime.notes: Sound Quake deals constant area damage in a huge radius, Staggering everything hit. Augmenting pushes it even farther, Dealing far more in an even larger the area, at the tradeoff of more energy spent. Fares very badly without a team covering her. Defense mods are fairly pointless. Augment is nearly always worth it. Makes a poor DPS for survival, due to slowing down enemy spawns indirectly, and generally killing things too far away

Ack and Brunt.name: Ack and Brunt
Ack and Brunt.stancenotes: Both <Impending Battery> and <Systemic Shred> are minimal losses, The entire stance is great.
Ack and Brunt.wepnotes: Solid stats across the board aside from range.

Amphis.name: Amphis
Amphis.stancenotes: Amphis is pretty much a single-target Staff, <Skyward Limb> is usable for minor aoe.

Anku.name: Anku
Anku.stancenotes: Anku has poor range and does not rely on natural Bleed procs, Leading it to favor speed over damage. <Abyssal Automaton> is very close, But also harder to use for most. <Fading Hope> causes a Bleed for 300% damage
Anku.wepnotes: High crit chance and decent attack speed. Nothing else really stands out.

Ankyros Prime.name: Ankyros Prime
Ankyros Prime.stancenotes: Note that if the enemy is not going to stand there and let you wail on them for the full combo, it is better to use <River's Grief> instead
Ankyros Prime.wepnotes: Fast (can make you miss Gaia's combos). Deals plenty of damage and has prompted finishers and ground finishers. Strong critical stats

Arca Titron.name: Arca Titron
Arca Titron.stancenotes: (Crushing Ruin)'s <Raging Whirlwind> is a small downgrade, but is also easier to pull off in combat
Arca Titron.wepnotes: Great status, crit, and damage. Slow attack speed. Slams have 100% Electric proc, has +100% damage to next slam attack, stacking 10x for 20s ea.

Atterax.name: Atterax
Atterax.stancenotes: Even without Maiming Strike, Spamming Slide Attacks with the Atterax is the best use for it. This weapon is not Rated for Maiming Strike as it is unobtainable outside of Trading and has a crazy price.
Atterax.wepnotes: Insane slide attack damage and range that can hit through walls. Even stronger with Maiming Strike, but still does amazing without it. Slower to kill armored targets while waiting for bleed stacks.

Bo Prime.name: Bo Prime
Bo Prime.stancenotes: Bo Prime is pretty much a single-target Staff, <Skyward Limb> is usable for minor aoe.
Bo Prime.wepnotes: Barely makes the cut as a Critical weapon, Range is decent.

Broken Scepter.name: Broken Scepter
Broken Scepter.stancenotes: Broken Scepter is pretty much a single-target Staff, <Skyward Limb> is usable for minor aoe.
Broken Scepter.wepnotes: Needs more Crit chance or Range. Drains health orbs from organic corpses and energy orbs from robotic corpses. Animation is long, drain is very low.

Broken War.name: Broken War
Broken War.stancenotes: Note that if the enemy is not going to stand there and let you wail on them for the full combo, it is better to use <Crimson Orbit> instead
Broken War.wepnotes: The current king of single swords, due to it's staggering base damage. Range is poor

Cassowar.name: Cassowar
Cassowar.wepnotes: Great status, damage, attack speed, and range. Terrible crit. Don't poke your eye out.

Caustacyst.name: Caustacyst
Caustacyst.stancenotes: <Fading Hope> causes a Bleed for 300% damage
Caustacyst.wepnotes: The only reason to use this is for the wave it launches on its charge attack. The wave will stagger and proc, opening them up to finishers

Ceramic Dagger.name: Ceramic Dagger
Ceramic Dagger.stancenotes: Any of the other Combos will be a very minor loss at worst, <Butterfly Slash> causes two Bleeds at 250% damage each

Cerata.name: Cerata
Cerata.stancenotes: <Rising Moon> can melt anything that actually takes all the hits
Cerata.wepnotes: Nasty crit-status weapon. Good range and spins. Stances offer multihits. Don't throw with this.

Cronus.name: Cronus
Cronus.wepnotes: Would be garbage without Vengeful Revenant

Dakra Prime.name: Dakra Prime
Dakra Prime.stancenotes: Note that if the enemy is not going to stand there and let you wail on them for the full combo, it is better to use <Crimson Orbit> instead
Dakra Prime.wepnotes: Holds a decent spot through the use of Crimson Dervish and Criticals. Range is poor

Dark Split-Sword.name: Dark Split-Sword
Dark Split-Sword.stancenotes: Stop Broken Bull after 7 spins or you Stagger, Sundered Tusk gives mobility and CC if needed
Dark Split-Sword.wepnotes: Status wep with good range. Broken Bullshit allows it to deal high damage, and critical chance is just high enough to use Berserker. Worst heavy blade

Dark Split-Sword (Dual Swords).name: Dark Split-Sword (Dual Swords)
Dark Split-Sword (Dual Swords).stancenotes: <Northern Coil> is acceptable to use when you feel a full <Winding Claws> would overkill
Dark Split-Sword (Dual Swords).wepnotes: Base damage and criticals make it the second best dual sword. Good status, but poor reach.

Dark Sword.name: Dark Sword
Dark Sword.stancenotes: (Crimson Dervish) slows the weapon too much and provides little gain.
Dark Sword.wepnotes: Would be garbage without Vengeful Revenant

Destreza.name: Destreza
Destreza.stancenotes: <Duel Secrets> is an easier to use combo for an overall loss
Destreza.wepnotes: Bad range relative to top tier. Slow to kill multiple targets. Insane single target damage, armor and shields don't matter. Stacks of critical-bleeds onto enemies, blazing swing speed, but range is very short

Dex Dakra.name: Dex Dakra
Dex Dakra.stancenotes: <Northern Coil> is acceptable to use when you feel a full <Winding Claws> would overkill
Dex Dakra.wepnotes: Decent damage, great slide attack, high status chance. Slow attack speed, low crit chance.

Dragon Nikana.name: Dragon Nikana
Dragon Nikana.stancenotes: (Blind Justice) is very close, but has more unwieldy combos and the gain is very small for the cost
Dragon Nikana.wepnotes: Great stats, but poor range. If you want a Riven for a Nikana, this is the one.

Dual Ether.name: Dual Ether
Dual Ether.stancenotes: <Northern Coil> is acceptable to use when you feel a full <Winding Claws> would overkill
Dual Ether.wepnotes: Meh stances and combos, Bad stats. Not much else to say

Dual Heat Swords.name: Dual Heat Swords
Dual Heat Swords.stancenotes: <Northern Coil> is acceptable to use when you feel a full <Winding Claws> would overkill
Dual Heat Swords.wepnotes: Bad stances, combos, and stats. Slightly good status chance.

Dual Ichor.name: Dual Ichor
Dual Ichor.stancenotes: <Northern Coil> is acceptable to use when you feel a full <Winding Claws> would overkill
Dual Ichor.wepnotes: Status and Criticals make it a strong Dual Sword. It's got poor reach.

Dual Kamas Prime.name: Dual Kamas Prime
Dual Kamas Prime.stancenotes: <Northern Coil> is acceptable to use when you feel a full <Winding Claws> would overkill
Dual Kamas Prime.wepnotes: Bleeds and Criticals make it a strong Dual Sword. It's got status and poor reach.

Dual Krohkur.name: Dual Krohkur
Dual Krohkur.wepnotes: Good damage, great status, good critical, insane slide attack damage. Low crit mult.

Dual Raza.name: Dual Raza
Dual Raza.stancenotes: <Northern Coil> is acceptable to use when you feel a full <Winding Claws> would overkill
Dual Raza.wepnotes: Criticals make it a good Dual Sword. Poor reach.

Dual Skana.name: Dual Skana
Dual Skana.stancenotes: <Northern Coil> is acceptable to use when you feel a full <Winding Claws> would overkill
Dual Skana.wepnotes: Meh stances and combos, Bad stats. Not much else to say

Dual Zoren.name: Dual Zoren
Dual Zoren.stancenotes: <Northern Coil> is acceptable to use when you feel a full <Winding Claws> would overkill
Dual Zoren.wepnotes: Great crit, high attack speed, short range. 100% Slash proc on ground finisher. Use with Hunter set.

Endura.name: Endura
Endura.stancenotes: <Duel Secrets> is an easier to use combo for an overall loss
Endura.wepnotes: Good damage, high status. Great against armor or health. Low crit chance; high crit mult.

Ether Daggers.name: Ether Daggers
Ether Daggers.stancenotes: <Pincer Strike> can be very hard to pull off in combat, (Sinking Talon)'s <Lashing Panther> is a fine alternative. <Savage Tiger> causes two Bleeds at 125% damage each
Ether Daggers.wepnotes: Terrible damage mixed with terrible attack speed, terrible crit, and terrible range. Okay status chance.

Ether Sword.name: Ether Sword
Ether Sword.stancenotes: (Crimson Dervish) slows the weapon too much and provides little gain.
Ether Sword.wepnotes: Would be garbage without Vengeful Revenant

Fang Prime.name: Fang Prime
Fang Prime.stancenotes: <Pincer Strike> can be very hard to pull off in combat, (Sinking Talon)'s <Lashing Panther> is a fine alternative. <Savage Tiger> causes two Bleeds at 125% damage each
Fang Prime.wepnotes: Stances have too much animation lock and stats are terrible

Fragor Prime.name: Fragor Prime
Fragor Prime.stancenotes: (Crushing Ruin)'s <Raging Whirlwind> is a small downgrade, but is also easier to pull off in combat
Fragor Prime.wepnotes: Big hammer. Smash enemy. Slow swing. Crit good. Status okay.

Furax Wraith.name: Furax Wraith
Furax Wraith.stancenotes: Note that if the enemy is not going to stand there and let you wail on them for the full combo, it is better to use <River's Grief> instead
Furax Wraith.wepnotes: High crit chance and mult. Terrible range, low base damage. Nothing else notable.

Galatine Prime.name: Galatine Prime
Galatine Prime.stancenotes: Stop Broken Bull after 7 spins or you Stagger, Sundered Tusk gives mobility and CC if needed
Galatine Prime.wepnotes: Room Blender Prime. Insane range and just about everything else. Can be outclassed in some situations, but is the overall best.

Gazal Machete.name: Gazal Machete
Gazal Machete.stancenotes: <Lightning Siren> is far easier to pull off in combat, and is only a small loss
Gazal Machete.wepnotes: Great status. Alright damage. Bad crit, short range. Adds Corrosive damage to Djinn attack, while Djinn adds Corrosive damage to Gazal Machete attack.

Glaive Prime.name: Glaive Prime
Glaive Prime.stancenotes: <Rising Moon> can melt anything that actually takes all the hits
Glaive Prime.wepnotes: Nasty crit-status weapon. Good range and spins. Stances offer multihits. Throw is strong damage and bounces accurately. Fast flight speed

Gram.name: Gram
Gram.stancenotes: Stop Broken Bull after 7 spins or you Stagger, Sundered Tusk gives mobility and CC if needed
Gram.wepnotes: Bad range heavy blade, but otherwise good stats. Broken Bullshit as usual, stacks large bleeds easily

Guandao.name: Guandao
Guandao.stancenotes: <Drifting Steel> is best used only on single targets, <The Way> procs two Bleeds for 125% damage each
Guandao.wepnotes: Massive range, great critical stats, and good damage. Sorely lacks status.

Halikar.name: Halikar
Halikar.wepnotes: Only use for throwing. Disarms and bounces.

Hate.name: Hate
Hate.stancenotes: <Dying Light> can be used instead for a small loss, as <Shadow Wind> can be very hard to pull off in combat. <Fading Hope> causes a Bleed for 300% damage
Hate.wepnotes: AoE CC on jump attack, decent attack speed and status chance, high crit and mult. Extremely short range.

Heat Dagger.name: Heat Dagger
Heat Dagger.stancenotes: Any of the other Combos will be a very minor loss at worst, <Butterfly Slash> causes two Bleeds at 250% damage each

Heat Sword.name: Heat Sword
Heat Sword.stancenotes: Note that if the enemy is not going to stand there and let you wail on them for the full combo, it is better to use <Crimson Orbit> instead
Heat Sword.wepnotes: This weird sword can reach 100% status chance, is slash heavy, and can equip Crimson Dervish. Range is poor

Heliocor.name: Heliocor
Heliocor.stancenotes: (Crushing Ruin)'s <Raging Whirlwind> is a small downgrade, but is also easier to pull off in combat
Heliocor.wepnotes: Great damage and crit chance. Slow attack speed, low status chance, low crit mult.

Hirudo.name: Hirudo
Hirudo.stancenotes: <Rising from Ashes> opens enemies up to Prompted Finishers. If the enemy is immune to those, use <Burning Desire> instead. <Slide Attack> is an insane ragdoll
Hirudo.wepnotes: Great combos, critical stats, base damage. Bad range and status. Gives life leech and increases your maximum health slightly.

Jat Kittag.name: Jat Kittag
Jat Kittag.stancenotes: <Raging Whirlwind> is a fine alternative if dashing would be a bad idea
Jat Kittag.wepnotes: Insane knockback, great range and massive ragdolling from every combo and ground slam. Augment makes slain enemies explode for a % of their health.

Jat Kusar.name: Jat Kusar
Jat Kusar.stancenotes: <Fangs of the Lindwurm> and <Soul of the Leviathan> are both small gains compared to <Heart of the Naga> but are harder to pull off in combat. <Rolling Thunder> is a Ragdoll on the target
Jat Kusar.wepnotes: Insane swing range and automatic bleeds from its stance. Insane in every stat except status procs. No physical damage

Jaw Sword.name: Jaw Sword
Jaw Sword.stancenotes: (Crimson Dervish) slows the weapon a lot and provides a small gain of damage, loss of Status-per-Second.
Jaw Sword.wepnotes: Augment is amazing and stances provide strong multipliers. Low status, but builds for status.

Kama.name: Kama
Kama.stancenotes: <Lightning Siren> is far easier to pull off in combat, and is only a small loss
Kama.wepnotes: Godly stance but stats are actually bad enough to outweigh it.

Karyst.name: Karyst
Karyst.stancenotes: Any of the other Combos will be a very minor loss at worst, <Butterfly Slash> causes two Bleeds at 250% damage each
Karyst.wepnotes: Pure elemental damage. 100% Toxin proc on Ground Slam, decent status chance. Okay crit, slow attack speed, no physical damage.

Kesheg.name: Kesheg
Kesheg.stancenotes: <Drifting Steel> is best used only on single targets, <The Way> procs two Bleeds for 125% damage each
Kesheg.wepnotes: Slash heavy, barely crit viable, lowish status, poor range for a polearm, kinda slow, bad stances. Decent damage

Kestrel.name: Kestrel
Kestrel.wepnotes: Only use for throwing. Procs Syndicate effect.

Krohkur.name: Krohkur
Krohkur.wepnotes: Great base damage, crit and status. Slower attack speed compared to other swords.

Kronen.name: Kronen
Kronen.wepnotes: Slash-heavy Status tonfas. Speed stance and base damage all add up to a good weapon. Range is poor

Lacera.name: Lacera
Lacera.stancenotes: <Rolling Thunder> is a Ragdoll on the target
Lacera.wepnotes: Insane swing range and automatic bleeds from its stance. Strong in every stat except criticals. Great gas and electric procs when you mod for it. No physical damage.

Lesion.name: Lesion
Lesion.stancenotes: <Drifting Steel> is best used only on single targets, <The Way> procs two Bleeds for 125% damage each
Lesion.wepnotes: Corrosive form cuts through high level armored enemies by trading some damage. Gas form can have problems vs armor, but will turn anything else into jelly in mere seconds. Swing range is very high

Machete Wraith.name: Machete Wraith
Machete Wraith.stancenotes: <Lightning Siren> is far easier to pull off in combat, and is only a small loss
Machete Wraith.wepnotes: Godly stance but stats are actually bad enough to outweigh it.

Mios.name: Mios
Mios.stancenotes: <Fangs of the Lindwurm> and <Soul of the Leviathan> are both small gains compared to <Heart of the Naga> but are harder to pull off in combat. <Rolling Thunder> is a Ragdoll on the target
Mios.wepnotes: Insane swing range and automatic bleeds from its stance. Insane in every stat, but falls behind its newer edition in base damage

Mire.name: Mire
Mire.stancenotes: Note that if the enemy is not going to stand there and let you wail on them for the full combo, it is better to use <Crimson Orbit> instead

Nami Skyla Prime.name: Nami Skyla Prime
Nami Skyla Prime.stancenotes: <Northern Coil> is acceptable to use when you feel a full <Winding Claws> would overkill
Nami Skyla Prime.wepnotes: Bleeds and Criticals make it a strong Dual Sword. It's got great status and poor reach.

Nami Solo.name: Nami Solo
Nami Solo.stancenotes: <Lightning Siren> is far easier to pull off in combat, and is only a small loss
Nami Solo.wepnotes: Status weapon with no range, Criticals and Slash damage are pretty good. Stance kicks it into overdrive.

Nikana Prime.name: Nikana Prime
Nikana Prime.stancenotes: <Guiding Light> is a small increase, but is harder to pull off in combat
Nikana Prime.wepnotes: Hits very hard, fantastic stats across the board, poor range but has easy to use long dashes in the stance.

Ninkondi.name: Ninkondi
Ninkondi.stancenotes: <Infernal Maelstrom> is very hard to get perfect timing on, using <Blazing Vortex> is a small loss for easier use, or <Molten Whirlpool> for the easiest use and a medium loss
Ninkondi.wepnotes: Bad range, slow start, animation lock. Upside is the ability to hit 100% status chance easily while also being a critical weapon.

Ohma.name: Ohma
Ohma.wepnotes: Great status chance. Ground Slam is an AOE Electric proc, no matter what mods ya got. Rogue Edict will shred anything in close range. Build for Gas or Electric+Weeping Wounds. Range is poor

Okina.name: Okina
Okina.stancenotes: <Pincer Strike> can be very hard to pull off in combat, (Sinking Talon)'s <Lashing Panther> is a fine alternative. <Savage Tiger> causes two Bleeds at 125% damage each
Okina.wepnotes: Good attack speed, decent status chance. Bad dps, bad crit, short range.

Orthos Prime.name: Orthos Prime
Orthos Prime.stancenotes: <Drifting Steel> is best used only on single targets, <The Way> procs two Bleeds for 125% damage each
Orthos Prime.wepnotes: Amazing range. Good stats across the board. Suffers from polearm stances.

Orvius.name: Orvius
Orvius.stancenotes: <Rising Moon> can melt anything that actually takes all the hits
Orvius.wepnotes: Nasty crit-status weapon. Good range and spins. Stances offer multihits. Channeled throw is insane damage and stun. Unchanneled Throw is slow but okay

Pangolin Sword.name: Pangolin Sword
Pangolin Sword.stancenotes: Note that if the enemy is not going to stand there and let you wail on them for the full combo, it is better to use <Crimson Orbit> instead
Pangolin Sword.wepnotes: Okay Status rating, but fails to be Viable with Crimson Dervish and Bleeds.

Plasma Sword.name: Plasma Sword
Plasma Sword.stancenotes: (Crimson Dervish) slows the weapon too much and provides little gain.
Plasma Sword.wepnotes: Too slow, even with it's fine stats. This sword is far too slow.

Prisma Dual Cleavers.name: Prisma Dual Cleavers
Prisma Dual Cleavers.stancenotes: <Northern Coil> is acceptable to use when you feel a full <Winding Claws> would overkill
Prisma Dual Cleavers.wepnotes: Augment and bleeds make it the best dual sword. Good crit and status, but poor reach.

Prisma Obex.name: Prisma Obex
Prisma Obex.stancenotes: <Rising from Ashes> opens enemies up to Prompted Finishers. If the enemy is immune to those, use <Burning Desire> instead. <Slide Attack> is an insane ragdoll
Prisma Obex.wepnotes: Great combos. Bad range. Horrible base damage but super fast with high status chance.

Prisma Skana.name: Prisma Skana
Prisma Skana.stancenotes: Note that if the enemy is not going to stand there and let you wail on them for the full combo, it is better to use <Crimson Orbit> instead
Prisma Skana.wepnotes: Lower base damage than the Dakra is countered by it's Augment and Critical stats.

Prova Vandal.name: Prova Vandal
Prova Vandal.stancenotes: <Lightning Siren> is far easier to pull off in combat, and is only a small loss
Prova Vandal.wepnotes: This is a status weapon with no range. Otherwise has decent stats, Stance kicks it into overdrive.

Rakta Dark Dagger.name: Rakta Dark Dagger
Rakta Dark Dagger.stancenotes: Any of the other Combos will be a very minor loss at worst, <Butterfly Slash> causes two Bleeds at 250% damage each
Rakta Dark Dagger.wepnotes: Syndicate proc, status and speed make this a great dagger. Can use Covert Lethality

Reaper Prime.name: Reaper Prime
Reaper Prime.stancenotes: <Dying Light> can be used instead for a small loss, as <Shadow Wind> can be very hard to pull off in combat. <Fading Hope> causes a Bleed for 300% damage
Reaper Prime.wepnotes: High damage, high DPS, great jump attack, high crit. Short range, low status.

Redeemer.name: Redeemer
Redeemer.stancenotes: If you actually intend to use the Gunblade in melee combat, (High Noon)'s <Desperado Zeal> may be more to your taste
Redeemer.wepnotes: Very high damage per bullet, hitscan, bad status chance per pellet. Has damage fall-off at range and terrible accuracy. Pellets do not have physical damage

Ripkas.name: Ripkas
Ripkas.stancenotes: <Hungering Encroachment> is an easy to use dash if needed, <Raging Conflict> is higher damage, but has usability issues with actually hitting.
Ripkas.wepnotes: Weaker Venka Prime without the melee combo bonus. Insane damage, but armor must be considered

Sancti Magistar.name: Sancti Magistar
Sancti Magistar.stancenotes: (Crushing Ruin)'s <Raging Whirlwind> is a small downgrade, but is also easier to pull off in combat
Sancti Magistar.wepnotes: Healing wave is good, not great. View it as a perk if you're using the Sancti Magistar, but not a reason to use the weapon.

Sarpa.name: Sarpa
Sarpa.stancenotes: If you actually intend to use the Gunblade in melee combat, (High Noon)'s <Desperado Zeal> may be more to your taste
Sarpa.wepnotes: Very high damage per bullet, hitscan, decent status chance. Has damage fall-off at range and terrible accuracy. Status chance is not split per pellet. Great to build with status and Weeping Wounds.

Scindo Prime.name: Scindo Prime
Scindo Prime.stancenotes: Stop Broken Bull after 7 spins or you Stagger, Sundered Tusk gives mobility and CC if needed
Scindo Prime.wepnotes: Gram 1.2. It's slightly better at everything than the Gram does.

Scoliac.name: Scoliac
Scoliac.stancenotes: <Slide Attack>'s are always an option as well
Scoliac.wepnotes: Good range, speed, status, but no critical

Secura Lecta.name: Secura Lecta
Secura Lecta.stancenotes: <Slide Attack>'s are always an option as well
Secura Lecta.wepnotes: Great speed, high status chance. Everything else is bad.

Serro.name: Serro
Serro.stancenotes: <Drifting Steel> is best used only on single targets, <The Way> procs two Bleeds for 125% damage each
Serro.wepnotes: Animation lock like all the other polearms, but has no range or damage.

Shaku.name: Shaku
Shaku.stancenotes: <Infernal Maelstrom> is very hard to get perfect timing on, using <Blazing Vortex> is a small loss for easier use, or <Molten Whirlpool> for the easiest use and a medium loss
Shaku.wepnotes: Stances have far far far too much animation lock and stats are meh

Sheev.name: Sheev
Sheev.stancenotes: Any of the other Combos will be a very minor loss at worst, <Butterfly Slash> causes two Bleeds at 250% damage each
Sheev.wepnotes: Acceptable stance, good stats, but very slow.

Sibear.name: Sibear
Sibear.stancenotes: (Crushing Ruin)'s <Raging Whirlwind> is a small downgrade, but is also easier to pull off in combat
Sibear.wepnotes: No Physical damage. Good damage. Moderate stats across attack speed, crit, and status, CC on charge attacks.

Silva And Aegis Prime.name: Silva And Aegis Prime
Silva And Aegis Prime.stancenotes: Both <Impending Battery> and <Systemic Shred> are minimal losses, The entire stance is great.
Silva And Aegis Prime.wepnotes: Solid stats across the board. Stances provide tons of multihits. Poor range outside of the shield throw combo

Synoid Heliocor.name: Synoid Heliocor
Synoid Heliocor.stancenotes: (Crushing Ruin)'s <Raging Whirlwind> is a small downgrade, but is also easier to pull off in combat
Synoid Heliocor.wepnotes: High status, decent damage and attack speed. Low crit. Scans kills into codex. Creates spectors on channeled strike kill, if you own the codex entry. Generally not worth using over vanilla.

Tekko.name: Tekko
Tekko.stancenotes: Note that if the enemy is not going to stand there and let you wail on them for the full combo, it is better to use <River's Grief> instead
Tekko.wepnotes: Slow (can make it easier to hit Gaia's combos). Deals ton of damage and has prompted finishers and ground finishers. Procs bleeds. Insane Critical stats

Telos Boltace.name: Telos Boltace
Telos Boltace.wepnotes: Only reason to use this over the Kronen: slide attack. Sliding the first time sucks nearby enemies in. Sliding a second time in 10 sec sends them enemies flying with a ~5 sec cooldown. Range is poor

Tipedo.name: Tipedo
Tipedo.stancenotes: <Skyward Limb> is usable for minor aoe.
Tipedo.wepnotes: Can reach very impressive numbers with good range

Tonbo.name: Tonbo
Tonbo.stancenotes: <Drifting Steel> is best used only on single targets, <The Way> procs two Bleeds for 125% damage each
Tonbo.wepnotes: Slash heavy status polearm with good range. Suffers from polearm stances

Twin Basolk.name: Twin Basolk
Twin Basolk.stancenotes: <Northern Coil> is acceptable to use when you feel a full <Winding Claws> would overkill
Twin Basolk.wepnotes: Base damage and Status make it a good Dual Sword. It's got poor reach.

Vaykor Sydon.name: Vaykor Sydon
Vaykor Sydon.wepnotes: Acceptable range, crit and status. Radial Blind effect is hard to proc.

Venka Prime.name: Venka Prime
Venka Prime.stancenotes: <Hungering Encroachment> is an easy to use dash if needed, <Raging Conflict> is higher damage, but has usability issues with actually hitting.
Venka Prime.wepnotes: Punishing range (you can miss mid-combo from the impact procs), but the damage is insane, armor barely matters, shields matter even less. Benefits from melee combos and all mods affected by it.

Volnus.name: Volnus
Volnus.wepnotes: Great attack speed, high damage, great status, good crit. Lowish crit mult.

War.name: War
War.stancenotes: Stop Broken Bull after 7 spins or you Stagger, Sundered Tusk gives mobility and CC if needed
War.wepnotes: Great critical chance and status chance, range is good. Broken Bullshit makes it scale well. Only drawback is the Impact damage, which won't let you stack Bleeds

Zenistar.name: Zenistar
Zenistar.stancenotes: Stop Broken Bull after 7 spins or you Stagger, Sundered Tusk gives mobility and CC if needed
Zenistar.wepnotes: Staggers on normal attacks. After using its charge attack, damage changes to Slash, while maintaining status chance, range on swing is decent, is not affected by physical damage mods when disc is attached

Gunsen.name: Gunsen
Gunsen.stancenotes: <Cutting Fringe> gives the most multipliers. Best used with buzz kill to maximize Slash weighing
Gunsen.notes: Suffers greatly from lack of range. Use the Razor Fin combo if more status chance is loaded to force slash prcos on last hit of the combo at slight loss of overall DPS.

Kogake Prime.name: Kogake Prime
Kogake Prime.stancenotes: <Rising from Ashes> opens enemies up to Prompted Finishers. If the enemy is immune to those, use <Burning Desire> instead. <Slide Attack> is an insane ragdoll
Kogake Prime.notes: Suffers greatly from lack of range. Use the Razor Fin combo if more status chance is loaded to force slash prcos on last hit of the combo at slight loss of overall DPS.

Amprex.name: Amprex
Amprex.notes: Average damage per bullet, extreme DPS, beam weapon, punchthrough mods are outclassed by others, chains to nearby targets while hitting an enemy or a corpse. Wastes bullets due to beam. Horrible ammo-econ and magazine. †

Arca Plasmor.name: Arca Plasmor
Arca Plasmor.notes: Very high damage per bullet, projectile weapon, good status chance, magazine is suitable, ammo-econ is good. Reload is annoying and Fire rate is too slow

Argonak (Primary Fire).name: Argonak
Argonak (Primary Fire).notes: Average damage per bullet, high DPS, hitscan munition, manageable ammo econ. Scoping highlights enemies for easier targetting. Alternate between semi-auto (higher DPS) and full-auto (higher fire rate) to deal with different enemies.

Astilla.name: Astilla
Astilla.notes: High damage hits, low ammo efficiency, shots shatter on hit dealing damage in front of impact. High status, decent crit. Annoying to efficiently handle

Attica.name: Attica
Attica.notes: Average damage per arrow, high DPS, magazine is acceptable, ammo-econ is fantastic. Bad with High Caliber. †

Baza.name: Baza
Baza.notes: Silent, Hitscan, great recoil, accuracy, crit, fire rate. Okay status chance and ammo econ. Low damage and has damage fall off at range. Looks minty fresh †

Boar Prime.name: Boar Prime
Boar Prime.notes: Moderate damage per bullet, very high DPS, hitscan, status chance can reach 100%, magazine is tiny, ammo-econ is very bad.

Boltor Prime.name: Boltor Prime
Boltor Prime.notes: High damage per bullet, high DPS, projectile weapon, bad with punchthrough, ragdolls killed enemies, dealing damage along the path. Magazine is below average, ammo-econ is bad.

Braton Prime.name: Braton Prime
Braton Prime.notes: Low upfront damage per bullet, average DPS, hitscan, layers status effects on enemies and deals high DPS through Slash procs

Burston Prime.name: Burston Prime
Burston Prime.notes: Poor damage per bullet, low DPS, hitscan, great status per burst, horrible ammo-econ and magazine

Buzlok.name: Buzlok
Buzlok.notes: Devastating DPS on a single target, high damage per Bullet. Projectile weapon, bad with punchthrough, Alt-fire fires a mark, increasing the damage output and critical chance of the Buzlok and attracting its bullets to the marked spot (no matter what you hit, does not mark terrain)

Cernos Prime.name: Cernos Prime
Cernos Prime.notes: High damage per arrow, does alright with High Caliber. Ammo-econ is good

Convectrix.name: Convectrix
Convectrix.notes: Average damage per bullet, average DPS, beam weapon, great with punchthrough, high status chance is devalued by beam. Limited to one status proc chance per beam. Procs a lot of slash. Magazine is good, ammo-econ is below average

Daikyu.name: Daikyu
Daikyu.notes: High damage per arrow, bad with High Caliber. Slow draw time, ammo-econ is great

Dera Vandal.name: Dera Vandal
Dera Vandal.notes: Average damage per bullet, average DPS, projectile weapon, bad with punchthrough, has great status chance, ammo-econ is bad

Dex Sybaris.name: Dex Sybaris
Dex Sybaris.notes: Very high damage per bullet, average DPS, hitscan, headshots increase potential of this weapon, great gmmo-econ, small magazine but fast reload †

Drakgoon.name: Drakgoon
Drakgoon.notes: Above average damage per bullet, projectile weapon, bad with punchthrough, has innate punchthrough on charged shots. Magazine is horrible, ammo-econ is horrible. No damage fall-off from range

Dread.name: Dread
Dread.notes: Amazing damage per arrow, bad with High Caliber. Average draw time, ammo-econ is great. Use with headshots.

Ferrox.name: Ferrox
Ferrox.notes: Insane damage per bullet, very high DPS, projectile weapon, instant travel time, bad with Heavy Caliber, amazing ammo-econ, decent magazine. Terrible alt-fire.

Flux Rifle.name: Flux Rifle
Flux Rifle.notes: Average damage per bullet, average DPS, beam weapon, great with punchthrough, high status chance is devalued by beam. Limited to one status proc chance per second. Procs a great deal of Slash. Magazine is good, ammo-econ is bad

Glaxion.name: Glaxion
Glaxion.notes: Pathetic damage per bullet, average DPS, beam weapon, great with punchthrough, extreme status chance is devalued by beam. Limited to one status proc chance per second. Magazine is bad, ammo-econ is a joke

Gorgon Wraith.name: Gorgon Wraith
Gorgon Wraith.notes: Low damage per bullet, average DPS, hitscan, fire rate spools-up as it fires, bad accuracy at full spool, status chance is high, magazine is pathetic, ammo-econ is very bad.

Grinlok.name: Grinlok
Grinlok.notes: Very high damage per bullet, low DPS, hitscan, great status chance per shot, pathetic magazine, awkward firing animation can slow fire rate. Ammo-econ is great

Harpak.name: Harpak
Harpak.notes: Very high damage per bullet, very high DPS, projectile weapon, bad with punchthrough, alt-fire drags a target to you while knocking them down. Magazine works, ammo-econ is average

Hema.name: Hema
Hema.notes: High damage per bullet, high DPS, projectile weapon, bad with punchthrough, heals on headshots, magazine is fine, ammo-econ is good

Hind.name: Hind
Hind.notes: Low damage per bullet, low DPS, hitscan. Best built for status even with poor status chance. Magazine is fine, ammo-econ is horrible from how much ammo it takes to kill something

Ignis.name: Ignis
Ignis.notes: Acceptable damage per bullet, average DPS, beam weapon. Good with punchthrough and Heavy Caliber, everything hit explodes for AOE damage. Extreme status chance, which works despite beam. Magazine is slightly small for it's fire rate, ammo-econ is very bad

Ignis Wraith.name: Ignis Wraith
Ignis Wraith.notes: High damage per bullet, high DPS, beam weapon. Great with punchthrough and Heavy Caliber, bullet impacts cause explosions that deal AOE damage. Extreme status chance, which works despite Beam. Magazine is slightly small, Ammo-econ is very bad

Javlok.name: Javlok
Javlok.notes: High damage per bullet, very high DPS, projectile weapon, inefficient with Heavy Caliber, fast charge time, amazing ammo-econ, horrible magazine. Alt-fire launches explosion, dealing damage per shot in the magazine

Karak Wraith.name: Karak Wraith
Karak Wraith.notes: Average damage per bullet, average DPS, hitscan, great status chance, magazine is fine, ammo-econ is below average.

Kohm.name: Kohm
Kohm.notes: Moderate damage per bullet, very high DPS, hitscan, high status chance. Magazine and ammo-econ is manageable if modded for Vigilante Armaments instead of Shotgun Spazz. Ramp-up will increase pellet count to the point where innate slash and status effects (Corrosive recommended) will stack up significantly.

Lanka.name: Lanka
Lanka.notes: High damage; Scoping increases crit chance by 20%/30%/50% additively; Red critting is easy

Latron Prime.name: Latron Prime
Latron Prime.notes: High damage per bullet, High DPS, hitscan, acceptable status chance, magazine is fine, ammo-econ is good. †

Latron Wraith.name: Latron Wraith
Latron Wraith.notes: High damage per bullet, random DPS, hitscan, acceptable status chance, magazine is fine, ammo-econ is good. Terrible critical chance. Bad against armor and shields

Lenz.name: Lenz
Lenz.notes: Very high damage per arrow, arrows proc 100% Impact, pulse procs 100% Cold, most damage is Blast. Great with High Caliber. Ammo-econ is alright, has innate Ammo Mutation. Low rate of fire. †

Miter.name: Miter
Miter.notes: High damage per sawblade, projectile weapon, status chance easily reaches 100%. Magazine is good, ammo-econ is good. Bleeds make up damage

Mutalist Cernos.name: Mutalist Cernos
Mutalist Cernos.notes: Low damage per arrow, *arrows are followed by cloud trail, can reach 100% status chance. Clouds proc status conditions.

Mutalist Quanta.name: Mutalist Quanta
Mutalist Quanta.notes: Average damage per bullet, high DPS, projectile weapon, ineffective with punchthrough, acceptable magazine, ammo-econ is poor. Alt-fire shoots an orb that procs enemies who come in contact and buffs ally shots that pass through with vastly increased critical damage.

Ogris.name: Ogris
Ogris.notes: High damage per rocket, projectile weapon, terrible with punchthrough and High Caliber. Augment gives very powerful crowd control. Able to reach 100% status chance (applies per explosion target), magazine is fine, ammo-econ is below average

Opticor.name: Opticor
Opticor.notes: Amazing damage per bullet, innate explosions on hit, instant-projectile-beam weapon, great with punchthrough. Magazine is acceptable, ammo-econ is fantastic. Has a slight learning curve †

Panthera.name: Panthera
Panthera.notes: High damage per sawblade, average DPS for chainsaw. Projectile weapon, bad with punchthrough, magazine is small, ammo-econ is bad

Paracyst.name: Paracyst
Paracyst.notes: High damage per bullet, high DPS, projectile weapon, ineffective punchthrough, magazine is low, ammo-econ is fine. Alt-fire pulls a target while knocking them down

Paris Prime.name: Paris Prime
Paris Prime.notes: High damage per arrow, bad with High Caliber. Ammo-Econ is great. Bad against shields and armor

Phage.name: Phage
Phage.notes: High damage per bullet, beam weapon, great with punchthrough, good status chance is devalued by beam. Limited to one status proc chance per beam. Magazine is wonderful, ammo-econ is outstanding

Prisma Gorgon.name: Prisma Gorgon
Prisma Gorgon.notes: Low damage per bullet, average DPS, hitscan, fire rate spools-up as it fires, bad accuracy at full spool, magazine is terrible, ammo-econ is very bad.

Prisma Grakata.name: Prisma Grakata
Prisma Grakata.notes: Average damage per bullet, staggering DPS, hitscan, horrible accuracy and recoil, great status chance, magazine is poor, ammo-econ is horrible. Use Ammo Mutation or Metal Auger as preferred

Prisma Tetra.name: Prisma Tetra
Prisma Tetra.notes: Low damage per bullet, low DPS, projectile weapon, bad with punchthrough, best built for status even with poor status chance, magazine is fine, ammo-econ is horrible from how much ammo it takes to kill something

Quanta Vandal.name: Quanta Vandal
Quanta Vandal.notes: Very high damage per bullet, average DPS, beam weapon, good with punchthrough, magazine is fine, ammo-econ varies. Alt-fire shoots an explosive cube for 5 ammo, when shot by the main-fire these cubes explode for High damage in an area. Status build loses little damage, can be built that way no problem

Rakta Cernos.name: Rakta Cernos
Rakta Cernos.notes: High damage per arrow, bad with High Caliber. Lightning draw time, ammo-econ is great. Syndicate proc provides strong AOE damage + Viral proc and self energy restore

Rubico.name: Rubico
Rubico.notes: High crit damage; gimped by reload speed. Scoping increases crit damage by 35%/50%

Sancti Tigris.name: Sancti Tigris
Sancti Tigris.notes: Very high damage per bullet, hitscan, high status chance, magazine is suitable, ammo-econ is good †

Scourge.name: Scourge
Scourge.notes: High damage per bullet, average DPS, projectile weapon, ineffective punchthrough, alt-fire knocks down enemies and applies a debuff, attracting all nearby bullets to the enemy's head. Magazine is a bit small, ammo-econ is terrible

Secura Penta.name: Secura Penta
Secura Penta.notes: Low damage per bullet, high damage per explosion, projectile weapon, bad with punchthrough. Multishot is low value on this weapon. Magazine is low, ammo-econ is average

Snipetron Vandal.name: Snipetron Vandal
Snipetron Vandal.notes: Low damage, high recoil. Scoping increases dmg by 15%/20%

Sobek.name: Sobek
Sobek.notes: Average damage per bullet, hitscan, high status chance, magazine is acceptable, ammo-econ is very bad, reload is horrible. Augmented, it causes enemies to explode for damage based on their maximum health

Soma Prime.name: Soma Prime
Soma Prime.notes: Very high damage per bullet, very high DPS, hitscan, Heavy Caliber causes aiming problems. Magazine size is acceptable, ammo-econ is bad. †

Stradavar (Alt fire).name: Stradavar (Alt fire)
Stradavar (Alt fire).notes: Average damage per bullet, below average DPS, hitscan, Heavy Caliber causes aiming problems. Magazine size is great, ammo-econ is fantastic

Stradavar (Primary Fire).name: Stradavar (Primary Fire)
Stradavar (Primary Fire).notes: Acceptable damage per bullet, average DPS, hitscan. Needs Heavy Caliber, magazine is slightly small, ammo-econ is very bad

Strun Wraith.name: Strun Wraith
Strun Wraith.notes: Average damage per bullet, hitscan, status chance can reach 100%, magazine is good, ammo-econ is good, can partially reload and fire.

Supra Vandal.name: Supra Vandal
Supra Vandal.notes: High damage per bullet, very high DPS, projectile weapon, bad with punchthrough, gigantic magazine. Ammo-econ is poor at best, and horrible if you waste shots. Augment provides tons of status chance

Sybaris Prime.name: Sybaris Prime
Sybaris Prime.notes: Very high damage per bullet, average DPS, hitscan, headshots greatly increase damage output, great ammo-econ, magazine is a bit small †

Synapse.name: Synapse
Synapse.notes: Terrible damage per bullet, low DPS, beam weapon, great with punchthrough, magazine is horrible, ammo-econ is horrible as well

Synoid Simulor.name: Synoid Simulor
Synoid Simulor.notes: Average damage per bullet, deals damage in a small AOE when two orbs combine, detonating deals high damage in a larger area. Poor magazine, Ammo-econ is bad. Other mods outclass multishot or punchthrough on this wep. *Odd handling; high damage potential when used well

Telos Boltor.name: Telos Boltor
Telos Boltor.notes: Very high damage per bullet, very high DPS, projectile weapon, bad with punchthrough, ragdolls launches slain enemies for damage. Magazine is acceptable, ammo-econ is acceptable.

Tenora.name: Tenora
Tenora.notes: Very high damage per bullet, high DPS, hitscan, gains accuracy as it spools up. Great status chance. Magazine is good, ammo-econ is poor. Alt-fire is a powerful charge-shot with innate punchthrough, but can be hard to use. †

Tiberon.name: Tiberon
Tiberon.notes: High damage per bullet, high DPS, hitscan, magazine is manageable it's fire rate, ammo-econ is manageable. All hail the new king of burst rifles.

Tigris Prime.name: Tigris Prime
Tigris Prime.notes: Very high damage per bullet, hitscan, status chance can reach 100%, magazine is suitable, ammo-econ is good

Tonkor.name: Tonkor
Tonkor.notes: Amazing damage per bullet, crazy damage per explosion, ballistic-projectile weapon. Punchthrough will suicide, magazine is acceptable, ammo-econ is great. Grenades bounce, Adhesive Blast is useful. Hard to handle

Torid.name: Torid
Torid.notes: Very low damage per bullet, low DOT for 10 seconds. Each tick has status chance. Best status chance in Launchers, bad with punchthrough. Magazine is low, ammo-econ is pretty bad

Vaykor Hek.name: Vaykor Hek
Vaykor Hek.notes: Very high damage per bullet, hitscan, high status chance, magazine is large, ammo-econ is good. Slightly worse without Primed critical mods. †

Vectis Prime.name: Vectis Prime
Vectis Prime.notes: Double clip size of base and higher damage. Using Depleted Reload, clip is the same as base but reload speed is .25s. Scoping increases headshot damage by 15%/20% †

Vulkar Wraith.name: Vulkar Wraith
Vulkar Wraith.notes: Low crit chance. Scoping increases damage by 5%/15%/20%. Longest sniper combo reset time. Base is strictly worse. †

Zarr.name: Zarr
Zarr.notes: High damage per bullet, average damage per explosion, ballistic-projectile weapon, punchthrough is not useful. Magazine is fine. Ammo-econ is good

Zenith.name: Zenith
Zenith.notes: Low damage per bullet, average DPS, hitscan, outstanding status chance, ignore alt-fire, magazine is good, ammo-econ is poor

Zhuge.name: Zhuge
Zhuge.notes: Average damage per arrow, high DPS, magazine is acceptable, ammo-econ is fantastic. Status chance is very high, bad with High Caliber

Quartakk.name: Quartakk
Quartakk.notes: Very high damage per bullet, average DPS due to low effective fire rate, hitscan, eadshots greatly increase damage output, may have ammo issues especially when every trigger pull expends 4 shots anyway †

Corinth.name: Corinth
Corinth.notes: Very high damage per bullet, hitscan, excellent reload speed slightly hampered by delay between reloading and firing. Don't bother with secondary fire. All hail the new king of shotguns  †

Madurai.frame: Increased Physical Damage, Increased Elemental Damage
Madurai.name: Madurai
Madurai.notes: Both Dash nodes suck. Both of the Blast nodes are great and get better with amps. Void Radiance is decent. Void Strike is pathetic for its cost.
Madurai.op: Increased Operator Energy Pool and Regeneration for Amps

Naramon.frame: Increased Affinity gain from Melee, Preserves Melee Combo for longer
Naramon.name: Naramon
Naramon.notes: You will never find a time or place to use Void Stalker. Executing Dash is useful with the operator changes. Surging Dash is bad. Blast nodes are good, since they're spammable.
Naramon.op: Increased Operator MoveSpeed and Void Dash Speed

Unairu.frame: Returns part of Damage Taken, Increased Warframe Armor
Unairu.name: Unairu
Unairu.notes: Void Shadow is nice at the right time, the other Void node is laughable. Magnetic Blast has a short duration, but is decent. Good with shotguns. Wisps suck. Dash Nodes suck.
Unairu.op: Increased Operator Armor, Increased Operator Armor (a second time)

Vazarin.frame: Increased Affinity Radius, Limited Instant Revives
Vazarin.name: Vazarin
Vazarin.notes: The Dash nodes are great, provided you are in hard content. Blast nodes suck. Horribly.
Vazarin.op: Increased Operator Health and Health Regeneration

Zenurik.frame: Increased Energy Orb pickups, Area Energy Restore over time, Increased Melee Channeling Efficiency
Zenurik.name: Zenurik
Zenurik.notes: Every single thing that has a flat number value is garbage. Temporal Blast is acceptable.
Zenurik.op: Increased Operator Energy Pool and Regeneration

Acrid.name: Acrid
Acrid.notes: High damage per dart, very high DOT from innate Toxin proc on each dart. Bonus damage scales as 50% of the total Toxin damage on the weapon per tick, 7 ticks over 6 seconds. Projectile weapon, bad with punchthrough. Magazine is tiny, ammo-econ is poor. Pinpoint accurate and no recoil

Afuris.name: Afuris
Afuris.notes: Low damage per bullet, average DPS. Hitscan, magazine is a joke, ammo-econ is horrible. Inaccurate, moderate recoil

Akbronco Prime.name: Akbronco Prime
Akbronco Prime.notes: Amazing damage per bullet, high DPS. Hitscan, magazine is a low, ammo-econ is great. Extreme damage fall-off over range. Status can reach 100% per pellet.

Akjagara.name: Akjagara
Akjagara.notes: High damage per bullet, very high DPS. Hitscan, magazine is fine, ammo-econ is below average. Massive recoil, short range

Aklato.name: Aklato
Aklato.notes: Low damage per bullet, average DPS. Hitscan, magazine is a bit low, ammo-econ is poor. Low recoil and high accuracy. Should have two status mods.

Aklex Prime.name: Aklex Prime
Aklex Prime.notes: Amazing damage per bullet, high DPS, hitscan, magazine is fine, ammo-econ is fantastic. Stunning Speed mod advised for it's last slot. Massive recoil and pinpoint accurate

Akmagnus.name: Akmagnus
Akmagnus.notes: Average damage per Bullet, high DPS. Hitscan, magazine is acceptable, ammo-econ is acceptable. Use with Stunning Speed mod. Average recoil and very accurate.

Aksomati.name: Aksomati
Aksomati.notes: Average damage per bullet, high DPS. Hitscan, magazine is bad, ammo-econ is bad. Average recoil and inaccurate. Status outperforms raw damage.  High Viable with consistent headshots

Akstiletto Prime.name: Akstiletto Prime
Akstiletto Prime.notes: High damage per bullet, very high DPS, hitscan, magazine is acceptable, ammo-econ is good. Very low recoil, very accurate. Use with two status mods. Has amazing stats across the board stats with no drawbacks

Akvasto.name: Akvasto
Akvasto.notes: Average damage per bullet, high DPS. Hitscan, magazine is acceptable, ammo-econ is good.

Akzani.name: Akzani
Akzani.notes: Pathetic damage per bullet, low DPS, hitscan weapon, magazine is bad for it's fire rate, ammo-econ is awful. High recoil, very inaccurate

Angstrum.name: Angstrum
Angstrum.notes: High damage per bullet, low DPS, projectile weapon, bad with punchthrough, bad accuracy with multshot. ammo-econ is bad. Consumes 1 ammo per charge-level and the charge cannot be "held

Arca Scisco.name: Arca Scisco
Arca Scisco.notes: Great crit, damage, and status. Insane Target Analysis buff gives +4% flat crit/status bonus up to 5x (decays at 2s per stack). Hitscan. Ammo econ is okay.

Atomos.name: Atomos
Atomos.notes: Average damage per bullet, high DPS, beam weapon, great with punchthrough, great with Ruinous Extension mod. Chains through corpses and enemies. Magazine is slightly small, ammo-econ is very bad. Hard to handle range.

Azima.name: Azima
Azima.notes: Average damage per bullet, high DPS. Hitscan, magazine is acceptable, high status chance, ammo-econ is terrible. Alt-Fire empties the mag in a direction, leaving it spinning in place shooting in a medium area.

Ballistica Prime.name: Ballistica Prime
Ballistica Prime.notes: Amazing damage per arrow, high DPS, projectile weapon, magazine is very slightly small, ammo-econ is poor. Recoil is very low, Accuracy is near-pinpoint. Charged shots grant "ghost" of slain enemy for 7 sec. Status chance mods are a solid benefit. Top tier with consistent headshots.

Bolto.name: Bolto
Bolto.notes: Average damage per bullet, average DPS, projectile weapon, bad with punchthrough, launches killed enemies as projectiles. Augment is worth using for syndicate proc, magazine is slightly small, ammo-econ is poor

Brakk.name: Brakk
Brakk.notes: High damage, rate of fire, crit, and status. Great ammo efficiency. Pretty bad damage fall off.

Bronco Prime.name: Bronco Prime
Bronco Prime.notes: Amazing damage per bullet, high DPS. Hitscan, magazine is a low, ammo-econ is great. Extreme damage fall-off over range. Status can reach 100% per pellet.

Cestra.name: Cestra
Cestra.notes: Pathetic damage per bullet, low DPS, projectile weapon, bad with punchthrough, magazine is bad, ammo-econ is terrible. Average recoil, inaccurate

Cycron.name: Cycron
Cycron.notes: Poor damage per bullet, acceptable DPS, beam weapon, good with punchthrough, and Ruinous Extension mod. High status chance is devalued by beam. Magazine is small for its fire rate, ammo-econ is special. Ammo recharges as you fire. Cannot pickup ammo and has no extra mags.

Despair.name: Despair
Despair.notes: Poor damage per kunai, acceptable DPS, projectile weapon, bad with punchthrough, magazine is fine, ammo-econ is below average

Detron.name: Detron
Detron.notes: Okay damage per bullet, very high DPS, projectile weapon, bad with punchthrough, magazine is acceptable, worse but not terrible ammo-econ. Terrible vs Infested

Dex Furis.name: Dex Furis
Dex Furis.notes: Low damage per bullet, high DPS, hitscan, magazine is a bit low, ammo-econ is horrible

Dual Toxocyst.name: Dual Toxocyst
Dual Toxocyst.notes: Very high damage per bullet, high DPS. Hitscan, magazine is fine, ammo-econ is special. Headshots grant buff that removes ammo cost and recoil, increases fire rate, and adds Toxin damage for a short duration. Does not stack. Good status chance, use with Stunning Speed mod

Embolist.name: Embolist
Embolist.notes: Acceptable damage per bullet, average DPS, beam weapon. Great with punchthrough, good status chance, which works despite beam. Magazine is good, ammo-econ is very bad

Euphona Prime.name: Euphona Prime
Euphona Prime.notes: Extreme damage per bullet, very high DPS, super fast ballistic-projectile weapon, primary fire has great critical stats, secondary fire has amazing status chance. Magazine is a little low, ammo-econ is amazing. Nearly no recoil, but projectile drops. Alt-fire is shotgun with massive damage drop-off, but use point blank.

Furis.name: Furis
Furis.notes: Low damage per bullet, acceptable DPS, hitscan, magazine is small, ammo-econ is poor. Winds of Purity heals you for 20% of it's damage dealt.

Fusilai.name: Fusilai
Fusilai.notes: High damage, great crit and status on primary. Difficult handling on alt. Low status, crit, and bugged reload on alt. Okay ammo econ.

Hikou Prime.name: Hikou Prime
Hikou Prime.notes: Poor damage per star, acceptable DPS, projectile weapon, bad with punchthrough, magazine is small for its fire rate but reload is fast, ammo-econ is horrible. Use as a Concealed Explosives stick.

Knell.name: Knell
Knell.notes: Very high damage per bullet, high DPS, hitscan, magazine is fine, ammo-econ is unique. Gains a buff on headshot that removes ammo cost, increases fire rate and critical damage for a short duration. This buff stacks. Must hit headshots.

Kraken.name: Kraken
Kraken.notes: Average damage per bullet, low DPS, hitscan, magazine is small, ammo-econ is poor, terrible recoil. Status per burst is acceptable for modding

Kulstar.name: Kulstar
Kulstar.notes: Extreme damage per bullet, very high DPS, projectile weapon, grenades cluster on explosion, status chance is much higher per shot due to this. Magazine is tiny, ammo-econ is acceptable. No recoil, but multishot adds spread but is still good. Extremely easy to self-kill

Kunai.name: Kunai
Kunai.notes: Poor damage per kunai, acceptable DPS, projectile weapon, bad with punchthrough, magazine is fine, ammo-econ is below average

Lato.name: Lato
Lato.notes: Low damage per bullet, average DPS. Hitscan, magazine is low, ammo-econ is poor. Low recoil and high accuracy. Should have two status mods.

Lex Prime.name: Lex Prime
Lex Prime.notes: Amazing damage per bullet, high DPS, hitscan, magazine is fine, ammo-econ is fantastic. Massive recoil and pinpoint accurate

Mara Detron.name: Mara Detron
Mara Detron.notes: High damage per bullet, very high DPS, projectile weapon, bad with punchthrough, magazine is acceptable, worse but not terrible ammo-econ. Terrible vs Infested

Nukor.name: Nukor
Nukor.notes: Average damage per bullet, acceptable DPS, beam weapon, good with punchthrough. Magazine is small, ammo-econ is bad. Hits grant debuff for 50% increased damage from other sources for a short duration. Great support weapon. Great gains from flat crit chance

Pandero.name: Pandero
Pandero.notes: Amazing damage per bullet, high DPS, hitscan, magazine is fine, ammo-econ is great. Average recoil and pinpoint accurate. Alt-fire empties the remaining mag with automatic fire

Pox.name: Pox
Pox.notes: Very high damage per shot, very high DPS, projectile weapon, bad with punchthrough, magazine is fine, ammo-econ can be a problem. Status chance can reach 100%. Amazing armor-stripper and crowd control with Corrosive+Blast

Pyrana.name: Pyrana
Pyrana.notes: Extreme damage per bullet, amazing DPS, hitscan, magazine is low, ammo-econ is bad. Recoil is insane, accuracy is fairly good. Extreme damage fall-off over range

Rakta Ballistica.name: Rakta Ballistica
Rakta Ballistica.notes: Amazing damage per arrow, high DPS, projectile weapon, magazine is fine, ammo-econ is good. Recoil is very low, accuracy is perfect. Uncharged shots are awful. Use with two status chance mods. High Viable with consistent headshots

Sancti Castanas.name: Sancti Castanas
Sancti Castanas.notes: High damage, silent, Sancti proc, 100% electric proc. Decent status and crit. Bad ammo econ.

Seer.name: Seer
Seer.notes: Acceptable damage per bullet, low DPS, projectile weapon, bad with punchthrough, good status chance, magazine is low, decent ammo-econ

Sicarus Prime.name: Sicarus Prime
Sicarus Prime.notes: Great fire rate, ammo econ, crit, status, and recoil. Good damage.

Sonicor.name: Sonicor
Sonicor.notes: Acceptable damage per bullet, low DPS, projectile weapon. Status chance is actually 25% base, magazine is fine, ammo-econ is great. Ragdolls well with Blast. Has limited range before projectile explodes

Spectra.name: Spectra
Spectra.notes: Average damage per bullet, average DPS, beam weapon, good with punchthrough, high status chance is devalued by beam. Only one status proc per second. Magazine is good, ammo-econ is bad

Spira Prime.name: Spira Prime
Spira Prime.notes: Extreme damage per drill, high DPS, projectile weapon. High status chance, magazine is fine and reload speed, ammo-econ is poor. Use headshots for max potential. weird animations and difficult usage. Top tier with consistent headshots

Staticor.name: Staticor
Staticor.notes: Amazing damage per bolt, very high DPS, projectile weapon, bad with punchthrough, fantastic status chance, magazine is huge, ammo-econ is poor. Bolts have a small AOE, charged attack isn't great. Much better against armor.

Stug.name: Stug
Stug.notes: High damage per shot, very high damage per explosion. Globs explode shortly after launch and can self damage. Magazine is a bit small, ammo-econ is poor. Status chance is actually 10%

Synoid Gammacor.name: Synoid Gammacor
Synoid Gammacor.notes: Average damage per bullet, insane DPS. Beam weapon, great with punchthrough, magazine is slightly small, ammo-econ is difficult. Bad against armor.

Talons.name: Talons
Talons.notes: Easy handling, high base damage, procs puncture, ragdolls, great ammo econ, and accuracy. No physical damage, low crit, decent status.

Telos Akbolto.name: Telos Akbolto
Telos Akbolto.notes: Average damage per bullet, average DPS, projectile weapon, bad with punchthrough, launches killed enemies as projectiles. Magazine is slightly small, ammo-econ is very poor

Twin Grakata.name: Twin Grakata
Twin Grakata.notes: Low damage per bullet, insane DPS, hitscan, great status chance with sheer Dakka. Use with Stunning Speed. Magazine is a bit small, ammo-econ is awful.

Twin Gremlins.name: Twin Gremlins
Twin Gremlins.notes: Bad damage per bullet, average DPS, projectile weapon, bad with punchthrough, launches killed enemies as projectiles. Magazine is small, ammo-econ is bad. Struggles vs armor.

Twin Kohmak.name: Twin Kohmak
Twin Kohmak.notes: High damage per bullet, amazing DPS, hitscan, great status chance with sheer Dakka, magazine is small, ammo-econ is bad

Twin Rogga.name: Twin Rogga
Twin Rogga.notes: Massive damage per bullet, poor DPS. Hitscan, great status chance, magazine is pathetic, ammo-econ is outstanding. Optimal distance is awkward.

Twin Vipers Wraith.name: Twin Vipers Wraith
Twin Vipers Wraith.notes: Bad damage per bullet, but high DPS, hitscan, low status chance, low magazine for fire rate. Build for Critical. Terrible accuracy and recoil.

Tysis.name: Tysis
Tysis.notes: Low damage per bullet, acceptable DPS, projectile weapon, magazine is small, ammo-econ is fine. Keep at 100% status. Amazing armor-stripper

Vasto Prime.name: Vasto Prime
Vasto Prime.notes: Average damage per bullet, acceptable DPS. Hitscan, status chance is great, crit chance is great, magazine is perfect, ammo-econ is fine.

Vaykor Marelok.name: Vaykor Marelok
Vaykor Marelok.notes: Very high damage per bullet, high DPS, hitscan, status chance is great, headshots are great, magazine is good, ammo-econ is fine.

Zakti.name: Zakti
Zakti.notes: 100% Impact proc on direct hit, high damage per bullet, high status chance, decent accuracy. High recoil, low crit, bad ammo econ. Projectile. Significantly strong when dual wielded with Glaive

Akbolto Prime.name: Akbolto Prime
Akbolto Prime.notes: Very high damage per bullet, good DPS, projectile weapon, bad with punchthrough, launches killed enemies as projectiles. Despite having great damage, projectile munitions combined with high rate of fire leads to very poor ammo economy.

Stubba.name: Stubba
Stubba.notes: High damage per bullet, high DPS, hitscan, magazine is large enough for the fire rate, ammo-econ is low. Recoil throws off headshots, slight reduction to CD hurts overall DPS and low-ish status makes armor removal a chore.

artax.name: Artax
artax.notes: Procs Cold on enemies hit by beam. Scales poorly with everything

deconstructor_prime.name: Deconstructor Prime
deconstructor_prime.notes: Very high damage, very high status chance, and deals Impact/Puncture/Slash depending on hit location. Cannot be used with anything other then a Helios or Helios Prime

deth_machine_rifle.name: Deth Machine Rifle
deth_machine_rifle.notes: Low damage per bullet, spool-up time and acceptable DPS. Fires so many bullets it procs status often. Often get "stuck" firing at something it can't hit (breaking line of sight will reset)

prime_laser_rifle.name: Prime Laser Rifle
prime_laser_rifle.notes: Non-Hitscan, pinpoint accurate but has horrible recoil. Deals low damage per bullet that actually hits.

prisma_burst_laser.name: Prisma Burst Laser
prisma_burst_laser.notes: Inaccurate projectile pistol, but has 0 reload time and can reach high firerates with high status chance.

stinger.name: Stinger
stinger.notes: Horrible accuracy, bad damage, bad status chance, bad critical stats, procs Toxin per hit

sweeper_prime.name: Sweeper Prime
sweeper_prime.notes: High base damage, large magazine, low damage fall-off, but low fire rate. High spread. Hitscan.

vulklok.name: Vulklok
vulklok.notes: Low fire rate. Fantastic stats across the board except fire rate. Viable tier with no fire rate mods

frame.text: Frames are currently being redone. Please be patient as that part of the list is worked on!

hunter.text: Check the FAQ at the bottom of the page for more information on Hunter Munitions in rankings!
